name: The Forest Keeper
description:
The Forest Keeper is an adventure game in which you play the Feral, the guardian of the forest. Your mission is to save the forest from the evil that has taken over. Explore, solve puzzles and fight the evil beasts that live there.

Done by:

  • Jordi Bertran – Designer
  • Andreu Salvany – Designer
  • Sarah Doukkali – Artist
  • Adrià López – Artist
  • Eric Pastor – Programmer
  • Xavier Coch – Programmer
